Description: Specifies which variant of linearized power flow formulations to use in the optimisation problem. Recommended is 'kirchhoff'.
Add generators with a prohibitively high marginal cost to simulate load shedding. Choose 'false' to turn off or alternatively add willingness to pay for load shedding in EUR/kWh
Add random noise to marginal cost of generators and capital cost of lines and links.
Minimum number of solving iterations in between which resistance and reactance (x/r) are updated for branches according to s_nom_opt of the previous run.
Maximum number of solving iterations in between which resistance and reactance (x/r) are updated for branches according to s_nom_opt of the previous run.
To avoid too small values in the renewables per-unit availability time series values below this threshold are set to zero.
Skip iterating, do not update impedances of branches.
Flag whether to store the intermediate branch capacities and objective function values are recorded for each iteration.
Specifies the n first snapshots to take into account. Must be less than the total number of snapshots. Recommended only for debugging.
